changelogversion.changelogtext: Correction for the widgets data access.
Account visibility settings per database.
Quick-switching between local databases enabled.
Listing recent databases in the drawer.
Corrections and improvements.
Minor corrections and improvements.
Different implementation of the running balance for large numbers.
Fixed Dropbox authentication for new users.
Correcting and making running balance calculation asynchronous.
Ability to donate from inside the app.
Providing place in the exception feedback email to describe the action that led to the exception.
Correction for running balance.
Handling invalid symbols on price download.
Added Today as a filter period in account transactions.
Excluding Void transactions from running balance.
Listing transactions from the Category reports.
Listing transactions from the Payees report.
Listing transactions from the Categories list.
Listing transactions from the Payees list.
Ability to add Investment records.
Adjustments for Android 4.0.x devices. The app now runs on devices with Android 4.0.3 and up.
Corrected issues for Android 4.0.x devices!
Correcting entry of 0.0x values in numeric input.
Using newer Dropbox API methods to try to fix issues for some users.
Single-account widget. Currently showing the favourite account.
Improved running account balance calculation on transactions.
Corrected price update for a single security.
Adjusted QIF export to match the query account and amount.
Removing automatically-added new permissions.
Lowered the minimum Android version to 3.0.
Improving the Transfer type display for different languages.
Displaying the expression and amount in user's base currency's style in numeric input.
Show split transactions immediately if switching to split categories on transaction edit.
Corrected Search for transactions with status None.
Improvements for numeric input on screen rotation.
Sped up currency and stock price download by using YQL.
Update both amounts when editing one, for transfers in the same currency.
List deposit transactions first for each date.
Renaming the Tools menu item to Entities.
Not prompting for confirmation on close if no changes made on transaction.
Updated translations.
Styling the buttons on edit transaction form.
Added a convenient button for sending Logcat in About screen.
Restyling and minor improvements in numeric picker / calculator.
Graphical selector for easier Transaction Type selection in transaction view.
Option to remove a Payee on transaction.
Correcting handling for recurring transactions that occur 'every X days'.
Correcting the wrong sign for transactions imported via .qif in the desktop version.
Ability to set default currency for new databases with locales not directly supported by Android.
Language change correction.
Adjustment for prices retrieved from London Stock Exchange in pence.
Improved support for currencies with scale of 1000.
Other minor improvements.
Adding Tools submenu to navigation drawer.
Added preference for auto-synchronization on WiFi only.
Updated the link to our web page with the new sub-domain - android.moneymanagerex.org
Default filter for Currencies screen shows only used currencies. Switch via menu item.
Styling entry controls in transaction editing views.
Changed icon for Category selection to chevron.
Removing in-app donations. Please use links on our web page.
Ability to set the stock price manually.
Recalculating the stock value on price update (for desktop version).
Corrected formatting when evaluating expression on number input.
Added a behaviour preference setting for searching/browsing in selectors (category, payee, currency).
Correction: hardware Menu button now does not open double menu.
Minor stability improvements.
Calculating totals for investment accounts on Home screen.
Fixed expanded category selection.
Fixed empty Categories list when moving back through screens.
Fixed layout issue in Currencies screen for Android 4.1 devices.
Stability improvements.
Input calculator now acts more like a real calculator device.
Displaying exchange rate next to the currency name in the currencies list.
Option to display future-dated transactions only in the transactions list.
Single-click selection of categories.
Trimming names of Payees and Categories on creation and editing. This prevents creation of seemingly duplicate records.
Improvement in sync: Dropbox sync will not run automatically if it was run manually during the delay period after data change.
Remembering the search parameters when returning from the search results view.
Updated translations.
More minor stability improvements.
Improving Dropbox download by displaying a dialog if an update is detected on startup, and immediately opening the database after the download.
Preliminary mitigation for inability to open on certain devices with Android 4.2.2
Replaced the date picker to prevent exceptions on certain devices.
A readonly view for Budgets. You can now see the budgets created in the desktop version.
Calculating the actual usage in the balance view.
We now accept donations in BitCoin. See the 'Donate' page.
Stability improvement: solved another cause of errors on database switch for some users.
Fix: Report charts now show the data again.
Ability to change visible period for account transactions.
Major stability improvement: handling the database change after the notification is clicked on download.
Now accepting direct donations through our app web page.
Updated translations.
Catching all exceptions and offering to send the log to developers.
Introducing font icons.
Switched to Yahoo as the currency rates provider.
Correcting the currency exchange logic after switch to Yahoo.
Adding initial Turkish translation.
